projects.title: Zoom Car Clone
projects.description: Cloned some parts of Zoom-car website which is an Indian car sharing platform, headquartered in Bangalore. founded in 2013 by David Back and Greg Moran.

projects.title: Tesla
projects.description: Cloned some parts of Tesla website which is an automotive and energy company. It designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and leases electric vehicles and energy generation and storage systems.

projects.title: Survey-Monkey-clone
projects.description: Clone of a well-known website that let users to create, send and analyze sophisticated survey templates.
